technique.description: MR images of the right hip acquired without contrast.

title: MRI RIGHT HIP WITHOUT CONTRAST

findings.labrum: No labral tear identified. Capsular ligaments are intact.
findings.tendons: Visualized portions of the gluteal, iliopsoas, rectus femoris, hamsting, and adductor tendons are intact. Visualize muscles demonstrate normal signal and morphology.
findings.joint: No sigificant joint effusion or intra-articular bodies. No trochanteric bursitis. No focal fluid collections.
findings.pelvic: Visualized portions of the pelvic viscera demonstrate no significant abnormalities.
findings.bones: Bone marrow signal is normal. NO fracture, contusion or avascular necrosis. Articular cartilage is intact.

impression: Normal MRI of the right hip.
